pages.text: Just like $(spell)Spells$(), as you explore the world and find $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/prize)those cubes$() we mentioned before, you can also find $(item)Form Orbs.$() These orbs can be used to $(thing)learn or upgrade$() the corresponding form.

Using your $(item)Drive Gauge$(), located at the bottom right hand corner of your screen, above your HP bar, you can transform into one of a few different forms that all have their $(thing)own abilities, play styles and movement options$() to learn. These forms are known as Valor, Wisdom, Master, Limit and Final form.
